item.title: Hello World
item.author: palucki
item.description: Hello World! Or maybe rather: std::cout << "Hello World\n" Welcome to my personal blog! Why I decided to start a blog? I always wanted to share my projects, knowledge, tips&tricks etc. with others. Also, I wanted to have my personal space, which serves the purpose of my CV. Is there a better way to do this than starting a blog? Why Hugo? I wanted to have my content organized, portable… Static site generator sounds like a silver bullet for my needs.
